Righteous Prohibition.name: Righteous Prohibition
Righteous Prohibition.flavor: The creature before you quavers at the brilliance of your strike and finds itself unable to respond in kind.
Righteous Prohibition.attack: Highest ability modifier vs. Will. You have combat advantage against an elemental creature for this attack.
Righteous Prohibition.onHit: 3d8 + your highest ability modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is slowed, and the damage of its acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder attacks is halved.
Righteous Prohibition.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Chains That Bind.name: Chains That Bind
Chains That Bind.flavor: Brilliant chains erupt from the ground to coil about your enemy, the burning light causing it to shriek in pain and fear.
Chains That Bind.attack: Highest ability modifier vs. Fortitude. You have combat advantage against an elemental creature for this attack.
Chains That Bind.onHit:
2d10 + your highest ability modifier radiant damage, and the target is removed from play (save ends).
    Third Failed Saving Throw: The effect ends, but the target appears in a random location in the Elemental Chaos.
Chains That Bind.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Warding Advance.trigger: An enemy damages an ally of yours with an attack while the ally is within 5 squares of you.
